item.title: Bitcoin ETFs Record Highest Inflows Since October Crash, But Retail Doubts The Rally
item.description: Spot Bitcoin ETFs logged $840.6 million in inflows on Wednesday, according to Farside Investors data.

item.title: TSMC Posts Blowout Q4, Puts Spotlight Back On Nvidia: Retail Braces For Another AI Trade Overdrive
item.description: The Taiwanese chipmaking giant surpassed NT$1 trillion in revenue for the first time in the December quarter.

item.title: Tom Lee Says Sam Altman, Vitalik Buterin Slated To Attend BMNR AGM – Shareholders Gear Up To Vote On Massive Share Increase

item.title: MLTX Stock Erases Most Of 2025 Loses As Wall Street, Retail Bets On FDA Feedback For Sonelokimab
item.description: The FDA said that the drug, which treats a chronic inflammatory skin disorder, could establish evidence without additional trials.
